# Module: tf.keras.preprocessing.sequence



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/keras/preprocessing/sequence/__init__.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.4/tensorflow/python/keras/preprocessing/sequence/__init__.py).

Keras data preprocessing utils for sequence data.

## Functions

[`make_sampling_table(...)`](../../../tf/keras/preprocessing/sequence/make_sampling_table): Generates a word rank-based probabilistic sampling table.

[`pad_sequences(...)`](../../../tf/keras/preprocessing/sequence/pad_sequences): Pads each sequence to the same length (length of the longest sequence).

[`skipgrams(...)`](../../../tf/keras/preprocessing/sequence/skipgrams): Generates skipgram word pairs.
